name: A Friend´s Needs
description:
A Friend´s Needs

A small adventure exploring an interesting mechanic with bits of puzzle platformer.

´Fusion´ to create a stronger and bigger character that will allow you to reach unreachable areas and finish unfinishable levels.

Have fun!

Controls

AD/LEFT&RIGHT to move

SPACE/W/UP to jump

F11/F4 to fullscreen

ESC to exit

R to restart

E/Q to switch characters and exit fusioned mode

With colorblind mode!

Developer Notes:

- You might encounter some bugs and maybe even one game breaking bug. I apologize for that!
